name: Hamburger Worm: The Video Game (very early build)
name_original: Hamburger Worm: The Video Game (very early build)
description:
Hamburger Worm: The Video Game is a shitpost game made by FedoraMan (PocketEngineer) in which you play as well, Hamburger Worm, and his friend/pal/penis/ass Not Hamburger Worm. Use your cool abilities to murder people or to help yourselves.

This version of the game is very much so a prototype, if people semi-like it enough I'll consider doing a whole lot more with this.
